help-file.title: SONGS
help-file.content:
These are the basic skills of the bard and spectral piper, and have various magical properties. Certain songs are only effective on certain instruments.
6th level: song of sleep (Flute) piper: elegy of nightmares (Flute) 16th level: song of calming (Harp) piper: funereal hymn (Harp) song of discord (Flute} song of harmony (Flute) 21st level: song of protection (Horn) piper: dirge of bones (Horn) song of forgetfulness (Mandolin) piper: hymn of the zombie (Mandolin) song of cowardice (Drums) piper: terrorizing rhythms (Drums) 26th level: song of peace (Harp) piper: requiem of the crypts (Harp) 31st level: song of flight (Horn) piper: dirge of the ghosts (Horn) song of dragons (Horn) piper: draconic crescendo (Horn) 36th level: song of healing (Lyre) piper: song of the unholy (Lyre) song of harming (Flute) piper: song of decay (Lyre) 41st level: song of storms (Drums) piper: chime of the vampire (Drums) 46th level: song of heroism (Drums) piper: stanza of the fury (Drums) song of revelation (Mandolin) piper: hymn of morbid visions (Mandolin) song of chaos (Drums) piper: song of the night (Drums) 51st level: song of charming (Flute) piper: chant of subversion (Flute)
